comment: Dont make the mistake like me and nurse the arm by not moving it. The uncomfortable feeling the first day will get much worse.

comment: I would like to add an update on this for anyone who gets it and reads this, even if it helps one person.Have it injected in the arm of your non-dominant hand. The vaccine will be a little uncomfortable the first day; but, the trick is to continue moving that arm. Constantly.
